name: Order Up! (Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2)
description:
Combine Explosions, unpredictability, and Burger making and you got Order up!

Survive a horde of hungry red people and kill them by throwing burgers at them (There is no lore)

Controls

- WASD to move

- Space bar to shoot

- VERY IMPORTANT I FORGOT TO INCLUDE: click on the ingredient boxes to get them

- 1 and 2 to switch between burger and ash

- interact with kitchen appliances by running into them

-appliances wild randomly explode simply run into them and fix them

- If you fix them you will get ash which explodes on impact

Made by - Emeep                                               https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGHbPdW3y-rl9YZP9tUFQpg                                     (Video coming soon or maybe already came out depends on when you're viewing this)

Video is out                                                                                                                                                                     

Music by - My Friend (He said he didn't want any credit and want to remain anonymous)

I have absolutely no idea what I'm doing this is my first ever game that I've completed after about a month of learning unity. Criticism welcomed
